programme.title: Black As The Snow 2: Dead At The Summit
programme.desc: An SUV races over the cliffs into the depths - the driver is killed instantly. The dead man was apparently involved in a robbery but there is no trace of the loot. French Officer Vivier and Swiss Captain Meyer once again team up to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Lilly's Disappearance (2)
programme.desc: Lilly has now been missing for days without a trace. A journalist convinces Anna and Robert that the media could help. Meanwhile, the police unexpectedly focus the investigation on Lillys own parents. And the evidence against them is mounting.

programme.title: All the Blue in the Sky
programme.desc: Emile with early-onset Alzheimers disease and only a few months to live leaves everything behind to embark on a road trip with an enigmatic young woman hes just met through a classified ad.

programme.title: GAADI - Children Of The Sun
programme.desc: Stripped of her Radala cast and forcibly married to an outcast by the monarch, a woman fights to keep her dignity by rejecting to succumb to her destiny.

programme.title: From The Vine
programme.desc: A burnt-out executive experiences an ethical crisis and travels back to his hometown in rural Italy to recalibrate his moral compass.

programme.title: Elaha
programme.desc: Elaha, a young Kurdish-German woman, battles patriarchy and family expectations while seeking her own path. Elaha struggles with traditions, marriage and virginity, and she must choose between emancipation or delusion.

programme.title: Black As The Snow 3: Off Limits
programme.desc: A senior executive of a multinational company is murdered on a ski lift in the French Alps. Captain Meyer decides to investigate after learning that his ex-lover is a suspect. Accompanied by French Officer Vivier, he is determined to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: Hard Shell, Soft Shell
programme.desc: Loved-up oyster farmer Az thinks hes made it. But when an elaborate proposal goes awry and his girlfriend Jess breaks his heart, Az is forced to confront his understanding of what happiness really looks like both hers and his own.

programme.title: Lemonade
programme.desc: Mara, a young Romanian mother, is a caretaker in the US on a temporary visa. Life seemed perfect after she got married and brought her son over. However, she faces abuses of power from the officer in her green card process, who seeks to exploit her plight.

programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.

programme.title: Stormskerry Maja
programme.desc: At 17, Maja marries humble fisherman Janne and starts a family on the remote island of Stormskerry, where survival is a constant challenge. Amidst the hardships, Maja awakens to her potential, finding resilience and a love that transcends life and death.

Each week, a celebrity guest will follow the host for a stay with communities living in remote, rugged terrains. Stepping out of their comfort zones, they will learn essential livelihood skills and be tasked with challenges that will test their skills and character. At the same time, Ekspedisi Ekstrem gives an intimate glimpse of the communities' unique dwellings and their ways to survive.
